mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTES (TYPE_ID, ENTITY_ID, GROUP_ID, CONTENTS) VALUES (#{typeId}, #{entityId}, #{groupId}, #{values})
INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTES (ID, TYPE_ID, ENTITY_ID, GROUP_ID, CONTENTS) VALUES (#{id}, #{typeId}, #{entityId}, #{groupId}, #{values})
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTRIBUTES SET CONTENTS = #{values} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select A.*, AT.NAME, AT.VALUE_SYNTAX_ID, G.NAME AS GROUP_PATH from ATTRIBUTES A, ATTRIBUTE_TYPES AT, G WHERE A.TYPE_ID = AT.ID AND G.ID = A.GROUP_ID
select A.*, AT.NAME, AT.VALUE_SYNTAX_ID, G.NAME AS GROUP_PATH from ATTRIBUTES A, ATTRIBUTE_TYPES AT, G WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND A.TYPE_ID = AT.ID AND G.ID = A.GROUP_ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTRIBUTES WHERE ENTITY_ID = #{entityId} AND GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
mapper.select: select A.*, AT.NAME, AT.VALUE_SYNTAX_ID, G.NAME AS GROUP_PATH from ATTRIBUTES A, ATTRIBUTE_TYPES AT, G where A.ENTITY_ID IN ( SELECT S_E.ID FROM ENTITIES S_E, GROUP_ENTITIES S_GE, S_G WHERE S_G.NAME = #{value} AND S_GE.GROUP_ID = S_G.ID AND S_GE.ENTITY_ID = S_E.ID ) AND A.TYPE_ID = AT.ID AND G.ID = A.GROUP_ID
